update venue set brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, venue_name = #{venueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, venue_category = #{venueCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, detail_location = #{detailLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_week = #{startWeek,jdbcType=TINYINT}, end_week = #{endWeek,jdbcType=TINYINT}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT venue.id AS id, venue.venue_name AS venue_name, venue.venue_category AS venue_category, venue.province_id AS province_id, venue.city_id AS city_id, venue.district_id as district_id, venue.detail_location AS detail_location, venue.longitude as longitude, venue.latitude as latitude from venue INNER JOIN venue_sport_category vsc ON venue.id = vsc.venue_id where
venue.city_id = #{cityId} AND
venue.province_id = abs( #{cityId} )AND
vsc.sport_category_id IN
#{id}
AND
venue.venue_name LIKE concat('%',#{venueName},'%') AND
1 = 1
